content: I am not able to open any of the XML files from the UTG source of truth with the tool. Anyone else encounter such an issue? Toolkit_Error.PNG
Ok sorry but this is related - does anyone know about a resource called "ExpansionProfile"?
@Lloyd McKenzie do you know what that resource is/was?

Ok sorry but this is related - does anyone know about a resource called "ExpansionProfile"?

https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/ValueSet.20expansion. this was discussed in detail at that chat conversation

My question was not related to your question, but to validate a "fix" I just made: When you press the Search button, the toolkit is searching for all conformance resources, including ExpansionProfile, which crashes the search.

Good news: Toolkit Fixed (i presume this is the correct fix). It works...
Bad news: ..on my machine
Next time there is a release of the toolkit this should be there if Grahame validates it.
If this is urgent I can send the compiled FHIRToolkitR4.exe
ExpansionProfile used to exist. It got yanked

My question was not related to your question, but to validate a "fix" I just made: When you press the Search button, the toolkit is searching for all conformance resources, including ExpansionProfile, which crashes the search.

Thanks @Jose Costa Teixeira nothing urgent.
